powers.name: Pool.Teleportation.Recall_Friend
powers.display_help: You can Teleport one of your teammates to yourself. The target must be a teammate or leaguemate and can be selected from the Team Window. You can also rescue a fallen teammate who may be in a hostile location, as long as he is on the same map. Range is not infinite, but extremely long and can be enhanced. This power can be interrupted. Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Pool.Teleportation.Teleport_Foe
powers.display_help: You can Teleport a single foe directly next to yourself. A successful hit must be made in order to Teleport the target, and some powerful foes cannot be Teleported. Enemy players that are teleported will be temporarily out of phase, and cannot be targeted or damaged. This power can be interrupted. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

powers.name: Pool.Teleportation.Teleport
powers.display_help: You can Teleport long distances. Teleport has no recharge time, and can be reactivated without pause, as long as you have Endurance.

powers.name: Pool.Teleportation.Team_Teleport
powers.display_help: You can Teleport yourself and your nearby teammates to a targeted location. Teammates must be in close proximity to you. Team Teleport costs slightly more Endurance than Teleport, but you can Teleport your entire team for no additional cost. You must be at least level 14 and have two other Teleportation Powers before selecting Team Teleport. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack
display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 30 ft. radius (255 targets max)

powers.name: Pool.Teleportation.Long_Range_Teleport
powers.display_help: Long Range Teleport allows you to teleport very long distances, even across city zones. You must be at least level 14 and have two other Teleportation Powers before selecting Long Range Teleport. Recharge: Very Long
